Message.Title: Abramaoff speaks at Convention
Message.Msg: Parties aren't what brought former influence peddler Jack Abramoff to the Republican National Convention. At what he jokingly called his "first post-incarceration convention," Abramoff said he was in Tampa mostly to tell the media what happens at the private receptions he once frequented as a lobbyist at Greenberg Traurig and Preston Gates & Ellis (now K&L Gates) before he pleaded guilty in 2006 to bribery, fraud and tax evasion charges. During the convention, Abramoff said he ran into old friends, who were "wonderfully kind." The former lobbyist said he only heard "a snipe here and there" from his detractors. Abramoff spent 3 1/2 years in prison before his release in 2010.

notarethug- you're not really trying to defend Obama's record, are you? You are deceiving yourself if you believe his presidency has been a success. Obama is nothing more than a smooth talking community leader who had no business is the white house. In 3 1/2 yrs he spent twice what Bush did in 8 yrs. and that includes Bush's personal war in Iraq. Even Obama himself knows he's a failure or he would be campaigning on a successful record rather than throwing mud and lies about his opponent. Mud is all he's got. Yeah, you go vote for him in November and get back to me 4 years from now when the government collapses under his tax, borrow & spend "leadership".
Correction: make that tax, print, borrow, spend....

"...unemployment 12% and rising..." If you believe in "hope and change", I guess it's OK to believe whatever the voices in that space between your ears tells you..." ""President Obama and his party are going to be in Charlotte next week touting what they believe are their successes. It's important for our elected officials and party spokesmen to remind the American people of the truth about their time in office, which has brought 42 straight months of unemployment over 8 percent and 23 million Americans unemployed or underemployed." "Thank you President Obushma!"

" troops mired down in senseless wars in Iraq and Afghanistan caused by neocons' imperialistic jingoism" Here's how the messiah's "war we have to cut and run from" is workin' out for ya, since you adore his record of incompetence.. "Thank you President Obushma!" "The number of U.S. soldiers killed in Afghanistan has more than doubled since President Obama took office, The New York Times reports. One thousand members of the U.S. Army and Marines were killed in the nine years after the 2001 invasion, the newspaper said. The toll hit 2,000 last week when Specialist James A. Justice died of wounds in an Army hospital in Germany. The Times figures are based on an analysis of Defense Department statistics. The newspaper included U.S. deaths in Pakistan in operations aimed at aiding the Afghanistan effort. In 2010, Obama decided to send an additional 33,000 U.S. military members to Afghanistan. The surge increased the intensity of the fight there, and the number of U.S. casualties jumped."

A powerful Man buy properties and fixes things, including the nation, while pigmy retarddsed minds dance around their cauldrons trying to be cannibals. "Are you better off today than you were 4 years ago? --------------------------------------------- Yes, and that yes is -- IN SPITE OF JUG EARS! Just plain dumb luck and the fact that drilling the Marcellus Shale is on private land. JUG EARS has a thousand ways to impede drilling on Federal land and he's trying hard through the EPA (Employment Prevention Agency) to curtail private drilling, but thank God the Subversive One hasn't found a way or knows if stops drilling on private land he'll get a push-back he can't handle. The drilling unit that our land is a part of went into production in late July, production tests are indicating it to be the 32th most productive gas well -- IN THE WORLD. The buzz is $100,000.00 - $200,000.00 PER MONTH royalty checks. One local farmer's well that went into production last year was receiving $95,000.00 a month, but due to low gas prices and an over supply of gas his well unit has been throttled back, poor guy is down to $15,000.00 a month. Yes, I am better off than last year -- IN SPITE OF JUG EARS.

Genius! Sheer genius! As always. Always one of the finest of all posters in history. Our team may write in Eastwood/Chair, but more seriously, is split between Ron Paul and The Green Party. Some will hold their nose and vote Obama again, but no one on our team is dumb enough to believe Romney and Ryan's giant gaping endlessly self serving lies.
1. If you have that kind of mo coming to you, you better get your will in order so it doesn't go back to the state when you kick. 2. Low gas prices? Huh? Where? When?

At first glance you sound like an excellent candidate for a charitable remainder trust. You avoid capital gain tax on your property and take about six percent of the value of the trust (your property) each year in income and at your death the remainder goes to the charity of your choice. I doubt you will look into this given your temperament, but I suggested the same to another poster who came into money. She apparently took my advice after consulting with her own advisors and thanked me.
"the charity of your choice" ------------------------------- Is that the best you can do? We have sons and daughters plus dozens of grandchildren and great grandchildren.

LOL! I didn't tell you that you could deduct the charitable contribution for the charity's interest. I also didn't tell you you might come out better under this scenario than keeping it yourself and paying all the estate taxes you will owe on it. The older you are (and you sound pretty old) the more effective the tax deduction - and the less effective the estate planning. If you don't have advisors for this kind of stuff with the kind of assets you claim to possess, you are even crazier than some of your rants make you appear.

Topic.Title: Interesting Extreme Right Wing Doubts On Ryan

Message.Msg: Republican Vice-presidential candidate Paul Ryan made a claim in a radio show last week that he once ran a marathon in "under three, high two. I had a two hour 50 something." "Runner's World" magazine decided to check out the claim and scoured through the times of the Grandma's Marathon in Duluth, Minn., the only marathon the candidate has run, back when he was 20. Results show that Ryan's actual time was four hours, one minute 25 seconds. Had his original estimate been true, Ryan would have been the fastest marathoner ever to run for the White House. Sarah Palin, GWB, and John Edwards have all bested Ryan's actual 4:01:25 time.

Topic.Title: Interesting Extreme Right Wing Doubts On Ryan

Message.Msg: I am beginning to think that Romney has some serious compromises in mind and that he picked Ryan to rally the base before the election and to keep the base lined up after it. If my emerging theory is right, the tea party is not going to be very happy with a Pres. Romney.
Clint's performance was a clever distraction from the lack of any substance whatsoever in the Rmoney monologue.
